content: the choose your own adventure hat cyoa hat ©valhalla knitworks page 1 of 11 ✦ pattern information ✦ pattern name the choose your own adventure hat cyoa hat designer elinor nicole difficulty level beginner to advanced beginner ✦✦✧✧✧ finished size varies between styles & size designer s note text schematics are at the bottom of the pattern page for your reference i ve included metric measurements as well they are not included in the main pattern but are located in the text schematics ✦ abbreviations ✦ k knit p purl co cast on bobble bind off st s stitch es rs right side increase increase decrease decrease repeat repeat rc right cross how-to lc left cross how-to it is important to know how to do the old norwegian/twisted german cast-on here is a youtube link for your benefit ©valhalla knitworks page 2 of 11 note when using this technique you want to be extra sure your tail is long enough to accommodate for all the cast-on stitches introduction this hat is more than a pattern it s a journey each crown option carries its own archetypal energy inviting you to choose the story you want to wear ✦ prologue the hat of many paths ✦ in the halls of valhalla knitworks garments are not merely worn they are chosen destinies each strand is a thread of fate each rib a rhythm of the soul the knitter stands at the threshold needles poised like runes of creation german twisted loops form the gateway a circle unbroken a promise of stretch and strength the hem ribbing anchors the spirit snug and steady grounding the crown in balance then the body rises a path of cables spirals and braids twisting like stories told by ancestors at the summit three crowns await the warrior firm and structured armor for clarity the sage balanced and wise harmony in every stitch the muse flowing and dreamlike draped in song and spiral this hat is not one design but many it is a codex of choices a ritual map to cast on is to step into myth to bind off is to claim your crown ©valhalla knitworks page 3 of 11 option a the warrior s crown short beanie crisp structured and ready for battle the rib converges quickly creating a snug fit that feels like armor perfect for those who value clarity focus and strength option b the sage s crown balanced fit harmonious steady and wise the medium taper balances form and function offering a classic silhouette that honors symmetry and grounded presence option c the muse s crown slouchy spiral flowing feminine and inspired twist cables spiral upward into a soft starburst draping with grace this crown invites creativity play and mythic dreaming with super bulky yarn each choice transforms the same stitches into a different archetype the rib and cables are constant but the crown you choose determines the garment s spirit invocation cast on your adventure every stitch is a step into
